name: Source Protocol
introduce:
Source Protocol is a comprehensive blockchain technology suite for individuals, enterprises and developers to easily use, integrate and build Web 3.0 applications. It is a broad-spectrum technology ecosystem that transforms centralized web tools and financial instruments into decentralized ones.
In addition to Source's core products, which include a highly efficient layer 1 blockchain for secure and scalable app development and a full DeFi suite for borrowing, lending, staking, swapping, liquidity pooling, etc., Source's backend infrastructure is being made available for white label integration with existing online banking and finance solutions in order to more efficiently service a massive chunk of the traditional finance industry.
